Title: Relates to prescription drug cost-sharing assistance
Summary: Authorizes insurance policies which provide coverage for prescription drugs where cost-sharing obligations are determined by category of prescription drugs to offer a program to insureds that utilizes rebates or discounts to lower an insured's cost-sharing for prescription drugs if the insured's cost-sharing under such program would be more favorable than the cost-sharing that would otherwise be applicable to the prescription drug.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; amd §4406-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to authorizing insurance policies which provide coverage for prescription drugs and involve cost-sharing obligations to offer a program to insureds utilizing rebates or discounts
